3.title: The Temple Mount/Aqsa Mosque
3.plot: The conquest of the Temple Mount/Aqsa Mosque caused a storm in the Muslim world in the Six-Day War, and their world was destroyed. The statement "The Temple Mount is in our hands" by Motta Gur, commander of the paratroopers who commanded the force is still echoing but has intensified the attitude of the Muslims to the control of the Jews in the compound. In the absence of the Temple and in order to instill tradition in the eyes of all, the Temple Mount faithful are careful to go up to the compound, sneak a secret prayer, prostrate themselves at the entrance to the ...

imdb.plot outline: Holy Blood is a new documentary series centered on the holy places, the places that became the heart of the deep and unending conflict between Jews and Muslims: the Temple Mount, Joseph's Tomb, the Tomb of the Patriarchs and Rachel's Tomb. Each episode in the series will focus on another sacred place and see the deep conflict between the sides through impossible situations led by extremist figures who rely on the human, religious and historical aspects.
imdb.title: Holy Blood
plot: _Holy Blood_ (qv) is a new documentary series centered on the holy places, the places that became the heart of the deep and unending conflict between Jews and Muslims: the Temple Mount, Joseph's Tomb, the Tomb of the Patriarchs and Rachel's Tomb. Each episode in the series will focus on another sacred place and see the deep conflict between the sides through impossible situations led by extremist figures who rely on the human, religious and historical aspects.
